title: Make it illegal to deny gender marker changes to transgender individuals who have not had surgery.
body: In many states, it is a requirement for those who identify as transgender prove that they have had medical treatment or surgery to reflect their true gender. While, this is a crucial step in transitioning, most do not have the money to just go out and get surgery and in the mean time changing their gender on identification documents is vital part of their life.This petition is to make it illegal to deny someone's gender marker change based on the fact they haven't had surgery. Certain states DO allow for a transgender individual to change their gender marker but it is my belief that this is a issue that affects our whole country. This affects numerous people not just me.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Regulate insurance coverage of fertility treatments because everyone deserves the chance to have a family.
body: One in every 10 women in America struggles with infertility. With stingy or fickle policies, health insurance companies limit womenxs treatment options. There are currently only 15 states in the U.S. that mandate insurance companies to cover the cost of fertility treatments and procedures. On average, one cycle of in vitro fertilization costs $12,000 for both treatment and medications. Infertile women in the remaining 35 states must often pay for this costly procedure out of pocket. Without insurance coverage for treatment, many women are left with a difficult choice: pay for IVF themselves - or donxt have children of their own. This petition, by PCOS Awareness Association, demands all states to require insurance companies to cover the cost of fertility treatments and procedures.
issues: c(316, 25, 311) c("Economy & Jobs", "Health Care", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Do More than Extend Sanctions Against the Government of Sudan: End Genocides in Darfur, Nuba Mountains, and Blue Nile
body: We, the People of the United States of America, applaud U.S. President Obamaxs decision on 28 October 2015 to extend the economic sanctions against Sudan for another year, effective as of 3 November 2015. We do not support the Government of Sudan's attempt to lift the U.S. Sanctions against Sudan.We implore President Obama and his administration to act boldly, by holding the Government of Sudan responsible for the genocides in Darfur, the Nuba Mountains of South Kordofan, and the Blue Nile state. We must stop Sudanxs President Bashir from exterminating all of the marginalized peoples, his people, living in Sudan.Innocent civilians should be protected by the international community when their own government is scorching them from the earth. When the U.N. fails, the U.S. should lead.
issues: c(321, 24, 311) c("Criminal Justice Reform", "Foreign Policy", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Recognize the WASP as eligible for inurnment in the Arlington columbarium.
body: During World War II, a brave group of women joined the war effort by enlisting in the Women Airforce Service Pilots (WASP). These 1,074 women pilots worked stateside ferrying planes, towing targets for gunnery training, and serving as instruments instructors for male pilots. Thirty-eight of these pilots died in service to their country. Arlington National Cemetery is managed by the Department of the Army which says that, despite their service, these brave women donxt qualify for military burial honors. This disregards the fact that Arlington National Cemetery states, "Service to country is the common thread that binds all who are remembered and honored at Arlington." Please urge the Secretary of the Army to recognize the WASP as eligible for inurnment in the Arlington Columbarium.
issues: c(351, 311) c("Veterans & Military", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Classify the membership of Return of Kings as a terrorist group and a threat to the citizens of the United States
body: President Obama, US Department of State,We petition to have Return of Kings, a misogynistic online community, classified as a terrorist organization. Their current work is to inspire fear in women and feminists, and they have threatened assault, rape, and cause bodily harm to any who intervene or speak against them. Their current plans are to hold world wide gatherings this coming weekend. Their leader, Daryush Valizadeh (aka "Roosh V") has said that these meetings are being held as an attempt to legalize rape, and he has already been banned by multiple countries from entering, on the grounds of his promotion of sexual assault and treatment of women.Terrorism is most fundamentally defined as "actions designed to create fear/terror," and Return of Kings only intent is to terrify women.
issues: c(321, 311) c("Criminal Justice Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Reform voting.  The people urge this administration to stop the practice of super-delegates overriding the popular vote
body: Many Americans feel as if the voting system in this country is designed to allow a president to be voted into office that a majority of voters did not elect.  Citizens no longer want to be given the illusion that their votes count, when it is clear that the system is rigged to only appoint establishment candidates.  This petition is demanding that the practice of super-delegates be abolished, and that the president should be elected as a leader for the majority of the people, of the majority of the people, and by the majority of the people.  The citizens of the United States of America, who comprise the majority of this great country's population, want to take back our power, and ask that this unethical practice be dissolved for the 2016 Presidential election.  Thank You in advance.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: free David Walsh
body: My husband is being unfairly imprisoned in Colombia!   He worked for 23 yrs as a federal LEO, now retired. (Navy before) Our son was born 5 weeks ago. He is now planning to be a SAHD. As a present, I sent him on his dream vacation to Colombia. He was going to spend 3 wks traveling with friends. As a LEO, he LOVES guns. He took (what he thought was) an empty bag to bring home souvenirs. It turns out that in that bag were bullets for his M4 Carbine rifle. They arrested him because it's illegal to bring bullets into Col. He is being charged with intn to provide military arms (11-15 years): a 5 yr "deal" or to stay & face trial. He is sleeping in a cage outside w 5 others. US embassy there is doing NOTHING! My husband has spent his life serving his country, which is turning its back on him!
issues: c(311, 321, 351) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform", "Veterans & Military")

title: The murder of Samantha Payne
body: Sign this petition to keep Chylli Bruce in jail
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: Require Porn to be an "Opt In" feature with Internet Service Providers rather than a standard feature.
body: In its current state, Internet porn seeks out users by email solicitations and massive amounts of free content throughout Internet browser searches. The average person, even children, can type in the word "face," "dog" or "horse" and instantly be inundated with offensive and disturbing pornographic images. Parents and individuals have to go to great lengths to install Internet filters that often don't weed out all porn. We are asking for greater protection and responsibility from Internet Service providers and our country. We are asking that people who are interested in porn should have to seek it and choose it. They should have to "Opt In" for it by making arrangements to receive it with their Internet Service Provider. Everyone else should be free from it and assumed to "opt out."
issues: c(311, 316) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Pardon Kwame M. Kilpatrick & Bobby Ferguson of their excessive 28 and 21 year prison sentences for public corruption.
body: Kwame M. Kilpatrick was elected the youngest Mayor in the City of Detroit in 2001. He was vilified in The Detroit News Media daily for what many believe were racially motivated reasons.During a Whistleblower trial concerning an affair, Mr. Kilpatrick committed perjury and was forced to resign from office. After vowing to make a comeback, he was investigated by the Feds and found guilty on 24 charges of Bribery & Racketeering and sentenced to 28 years. His friend Bobby Ferguson, a Contractor, was given 21 years.Although there was no physical evidence linking both men to the alleged crimes, they were convicted with testimony from other Defendants facing prison time themselves. Mr. Kilpatrick was also forced to retain an attorney although there was a conflict of interest.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: We demand conviction of the USA president Barack Obama and trial in the International Criminal Court in Hague.
body: We demand conviction of a war criminal Barack Obama and trial in the International Criminal Court in Hague. He is guilty of crimes not only against the USA citizens, but against the whole world.One of the most dreadful prisons in history x Guantanamo - continues to function. Libya was destroyed as a result of Obamaxs aggression. In Syria, Obamaxs agents train, fund and organize terrorist groups, deceitfully naming them xmoderate oppositionx, who, among other things, bear a relation to Al-Qaeda, implicated in crimes against the American people. Secret services collect the Americansx personal data information on a 24 hour basis under the canopy battling terrorism, using electronic surveillance tools on political undesirables, effectively stomping on the Americansx right for privacy.
issues: c(311, 24) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Foreign Policy")

title: Stop the EPA from banning the building race cars
body: "WASHINGTON, DC (February 8, 2016) x The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has proposed a regulation to prohibit conversion of vehicles originally designed for on-road use into racecars. The regulation would also make the sale of certain products for use on such vehicles illegal. The proposed regulation was contained within a non-related proposed regulation entitled xGreenhouse Gas Emissions and Fuel Efficiency Standards for Medium- and Heavy-Duty Engines and VehiclesxPhase 2.xThe regulation would impact all vehicle types, including the sports cars, sedans and hatch-backs commonly converted strictly for use at the track." Please stop the EPA from banning millions of Americans favorite pastime.
issues: c(311, 296, 346) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Energy & Environment", "Transportation & Infrastructure")

title: Ensure the Safety of All Citizens by Banning U.S. Senators from Public Restrooms
body: In light of the fact that more United States Senators have been arrested for public restroom misconduct than transgender individuals (There has never been a reported incident of restroom misconduct by a transgender individual) and in light of the push in many states for legislations intended to ban transgender individuals from public restrooms, the transgender community is urging the administration to take executive action to prohibit U.S. Senators from being able to make use of public restroom facilities. The numbers clearly show that our senators are a greater threat to public safety than our community has ever been. Please take this necessary step to protect our women and children from potential danger in public restrooms.
issues: c(336, 311) c("Government & Regulatory Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Audit the NRA -- Publicly
body: This is a call for a public audit of the NRA's nonprofit organizations so that citizens can see who they are funding and whether they are behind the unrest caused by "patriot groups" in the West.
issues: c(311, 331) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Gun Violence")

title: Stop the Nomination of John B King as Secretary of Education until he can be vetted by the People.
body: Dear President Obama:We encourage to listen to and to follow the will of real classroom educators rather than countering the will of the dedicated professional teachers.Mr King and the reforms he promotes are have been discredited and need to looked at closely and publicly.Please allow the Senate to vet your nominee for Secretary of Education.Thanks.
issues: c(311, 18, 316) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Education", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Have NHTSA require all vehicles sold in the U.S. to have the fuel filler neck on the drivers side by 2020
body: There are several reasons why this is an important issue.First, people would be able to get into and out of gas stations safer and more efficiently if everyone was entering from the same direction.Second, people who have multiple vehicles, or who rent vehicles often would always know which side the tank was on.Third, and most important is safety.  People are constantly being approached as they fill up.  People-ESPECIALLY THE LADIES-have a much better chance of jumping into the car and locking the door if the filler neck was on the drivers side.This would take an engineering change by automakers that sell cars in the U.S. but should be easily achievable by the 2020 model year.  They have done much more complicated things in less time.
issues: c(316, 346, 311) c("Economy & Jobs", "Transportation & Infrastructure", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: We the people, demand justice for former NYPD officer Peter Liang
body: In Nov 2014, Peter & Shaun were patrolling the stairwells of Pink House. Peterxs gun discharged when opening the door to the stairwell. A bullet ricocheted off the wall & killed Mr. Gurley. Based on the testimony & evidence, Peter was too shocked to offer CPR, but called for help & ambulance.In Feb 2016, Peter was verdict guilty of 2nd degree manslaughter & official misconduct. NYPD immediately fired Peter, before he decided to appeal.1st, we the people donxt believe Peter was treated in a justice way. The only reason, for Peter be indicted & convicted as guilty like a criminal, in AN ACCIDENT, is Peter was treated as a scapegoat to ease the tension between black community & white police officers.2nd, we the people condemn NYPD for firing Peter before itxs final.Justice for Peter!
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: Change the national anthem to check by young thug
body: We damand that the national anthem be changed to check by young thug.
issues: c(18, 311, 301) c("Education", "Civil Rights & Equality", "Innovation: Arts & Technology")

title: Forcefully Resign Debbie Wasserman Schultz
body: Chair of DNC is clearly for Hillary Clinton, doing everything in her power to ensure that no one will effectively challenge Hillary's chances as the nominee. She has also put a temporary disability to the Sanders campaign which is extremely unjust to his chances. We must help!Wasserman Schultz is committing political malpractice and should be removed.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Let school teacher and YouTuber Mr. Beat interview the President for the song he will write about him.
body: We respectfully request that President Obama let Mr. Beat, a YouTuber, musician, and teacher at Tonganoxie High School in Tonganoxie, Kansas, interview him in preparation for a song he will be writing about him. Mr. Beat has written songs about each one of the Presidents and made them available for free. Teachers across the country have used his songs to make learning history more fun. Mr. Beat would prefer to interview the President in January, at the end of his term, to get his feedback before the song is created. He is willing to pay for all travel expenses and to rearrange his schedule to make this happen. To hear all of the previous President songs, you can visit here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHtE7NbaKReeVStWAF-UmA5ml--OhP7qh
issues: c(311, 24, 25) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Foreign Policy", "Health Care")

title: Recess-appoint a Supreme Court justice immediately.
body: A petition to direct President Obama to recess appoint a replacement Supreme Court Justice for Antonin Scalia, in order to circumvent GOP obstruction in this matter.
issues: c(311, 316) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Free Ramiro "Ramsey" R. Muxiz from federal prison. He's 72 years old serving a life sentence.  Non-violent civic leader
body: Dear President Obama: Please free Ramiro "Ramsey" R. Muxiz (40288-115) from federal prison. He is an exceptional person who was an attorney and graduate of Baylor School of Law. He was an important Civil Rights advocate. He's run for governor of Texas, lectured at numerous universities and was a licensed attorney.  He is 72 years of age, non-violent, in poor health, and wheelchair bound. He has submitted a Petition for Commutation of Sentence to the Office of the Pardon Attorney.His imprisonment is unjust as he didn't receive a fair trial.  Brady material was withheld by the prosecution.  His arrest was politically motivated. He has languished in prison for decades and it's time he be released so that justice may finally be done.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: By Executive Order, Declare This Election Day a Holiday, or At Least Close the Government Half-Day
body: Voter turnout is a democracyxs lifeblood. Pres Obama said xIf 99% of us voted it wouldnxt matter how much the 1% spends on elections.x Yet US turnout is dismal, never breaking 60% since 1968, ranking near last of developed democracies. Many peoplex35% of non-votersxdonxt vote due to lack of time during a busy workday. Obama has clear legal authority (5-USC-6103) to declare a holiday this Election Day or close the government half-day, by Executive Order. Presidents from Johnson to Obama routinely use Exec. Orders to close the govxt when Christmas Eve falls near weekends or when former presidents diexproving the cost of occasional half-day holidays is reasonable. Pres Obama could send a powerful signal and revitalize our democracy by declaring a holiday or half-day closing this Nov-8.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: require the federal government to ban open carry laws in all 50 states
body: The proposition being petitioned is the motion to require the federal government to ban open carry laws in all 50 states, allowing only law enforcement agents to openly display a firearm in public. In addition to removing open carry laws, only those who properly carry a permit, ID, and display a signifying wristband shall be deemed authorized to continue carrying a firearm in a concealed fashion.By implementing this ban, we aim for less unwanted exposure to guns, which will lead to reduced gun violence and gun-related deaths. In addition to instilling safer communities by promoting less tolerance for guns, possessing a gun is a responsibility that should not be taken lightly with slack laws. It's important that we prove that our communities can be safe environments free of violence.
issues: c(316, 331, 311) c("Economy & Jobs", "Gun Violence", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Appeal for an American Advisory Board to supervise the Let Girls Learn-Pakistan initiative by Michelle Obama.
body: As Pakistani-Americans, we strongly urge that "Let Girls Learn"-Pakistan Initiative to establish an Advisory Board, who has the expertise and knowledge of the education system along with the awareness of Pakistani culture; in addition to their expertise about American education system. We recommend that this Advisory Board should overlook, supervise and administer the accountability and transparency for the utilization of funds allocated towards this project,  as well as structuring a partnership  with existing authentic and established organizations that are involved in Pakistanxs education, for achieving xLet Girls Learnx goals.
issues: c(18, 24, 311) c("Education", "Foreign Policy", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Call on the US Congress to block all President Obamax appointees to the Supreme Court
body: After the sudden death of the Supreme Court, Associate Justice Antonin Scalia President Barack Obama who has to leave the White House in January 2017 claimed that he intends to appoint a liberal candidate at the Supreme Court. There were not many presidents who appointed Supreme Court Justices in their final year of presidency. We call on the US Congress to prevent the dangerous appointment that not only threatens the system of checks and balances but undermines the stability of the Union.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Halt efforts that compel Apple and other device makers to create a "backdoor" for the Government to access citizens data
body: The United States government has demanded that Apple take an unprecedented step which threatens the security of it's customers.The FBI, is demanding that Apple build a "backdoor" to bypass digital locks protecting consumer information on Apple's popular iPhones. We the undersigned, oppose this order, which has implications far beyond the legal case at hand. #Westandwithapple - Matthew KickFull letter: Https://www.apple.com/customer-letter/
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Respect the People's right to privacy, by inhibiting the government's compulsion of tech companies to create backdoors.
body: On February 16th, 2016, the FBI demanded that Apple "assist" with an ongoing investigation of a terrorist attack.The FBI's request was for Apple to change iOS (the iPhone's operating system) to contain a security flaw, which would enable the FBI to unlock (thusly decrypt) the iPhone in question.As pointed out by an open letter from Apple's CEO, Tim Cook, creating such a "backdoor" is an extremely dangerous premise. There is no way to guarantee that such an exploit would only be used by law enforcement in appropriate situations. If the exploit is there, it's open for everyone.This would harm only users who have no malicious intent by deprecating their privacy. Those who intend to commit crimes would trivially use alternate tools.This is an unreasonable breach of civil rights.
issues: c(311, 321, 301) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform", "Innovation: Arts & Technology")

title: A general election debate moderated by Wu Tang Financial, Wu Tang, or both.
body: We're tired of political pundits and mass media organizing political debates that either show great partisan bias or incompetence. Having Wu-Tang Financial (@Wu_Tang_Finance), Wu-Tang, or both moderate a debate would give Americans a chance to learn about the opinions and character of candidates with a focus on economic progress and development.
issues: c(311, 316) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Compel the FDA to publicly acknowledge that Cannabidiol is a naturally occurring dietary supplement and not a drug.
body: We the People have the right to regulate and control our health alternatives.  Wellbeing of the citizens is a fundamental liberty right as defined by the U.S. Constitution and should not be ceded to multi-national drug corporations or bureaucratic governmental agencies.   We hereby cordially request that President Obama immediately intervenes and compels the FDA to publicly acknowledge that Cannabidiol is a naturally occurring dietary supplement and as such should be not restricted as a drug as defined by the FDA. Cannabidiol (CBD), which is one of many non-psychoactive substances contained in the plant species, Cannabis sativa L, (Hemp) has been widely used as a Dietary Supplement (DS) for thousands of years. For the full brief and supporting docs; Go too www.davidandgov.org
issues: c(336, 311, 316) c("Government & Regulatory Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Grant federal prisoner Leonard Peltier a Presidential pardon.
body: Leonard Peltier is an imprisoned Native American.Leonard Peltier was convicted for the deaths of two FBI agents who died during a 1975 shoot-out on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation. Mr. Peltier has been in prison for over 29 years.Following the discovery of new evidence obtained through a Freedom of Information Act lawsuit, Mr. Peltier sought a new trial. The Eighth Circuit ruled, xThere is a possibility that the jury would have acquitted Leonard Peltier had the records and data improperly withheld from the defense been available to him in order to better exploit and reinforce the inconsistencies casting strong doubts upon the government's case." Yet, the court denied Mr. Peltier a new trial.Mr. Peltier suffers from many medical conditions. Time for justice is short.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: Sue the Senate Republicans for failing to fulfill their Supreme Court Justice Article 2 Section 2 Constitutional duties
body: Senate Republicans are obstructing the constitutional mandated process to fill the recent vacancy to the Supreme Court by threatening to: withhold/obstruct any Judiciary Committee hearing for any nominee offered up, withhold/obstruct any full Senate vote and/or delay the process until the President stops offering up nominees or such time that his term ends. The language of the Article 2 Section 2 of the Constitution describes both the Presidentxs and the Senatesx duties as mandatory:  xThe Presidentxshall nominate, and by and with the Advice and Consent of the Senate, shall appointxJudges of the Supreme Court.x  The Senate Republicans should be sued for violating their oaths of office by abandoning their constitutional duty as well as preventing the President from fulfilling his.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: ensure that people born with missing ear/ear canal do not get denied bone anchored implants by insurance to hear.
body: We petition the Federal government to ensure that people born with one or two missing ear(s)/ear canal(s) (called microtia and atresia) do not get denied bone anchored implants or similar prosthetic devices by insurance companies.Insurance companies are denying children and adults with birth defects the right to hear.  They cannot use a hearing aid because they do not have an ear canal to place a hearing aid or an ear to hold one.  Medicare has determined that a bone anchored implant is not a hearing aid but many insurance companies continue to deny these life altering devices because they claim they are hearing aids regardless of the Medicare determination.We ask that the government ensure people with birth defects have the support of insurance to hear.
issues: c(311, 25) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Health Care")

title: Remove Debbie Wasserman Schultz from her position as chairperson of the Democratic National Committee.
body: We, the people, are disgusted with Debbie Wasserman Schultz's ethics and demand that she be removed as chairperson of the Democratic National Committee. Her conflict of interest from being Hillary Clinton's campaign manager in 2008 makes it a complete shock that she was allowed to stay as chairperson for this long- but no longer. Her manipulation of the debate times to steer public opinion is immoral, unethical, and unfair to the American people. Her dirty, underhanded tactics to help Hillary Clinton are transparent and insulting to the people. Her direct statement about superdelegates being used to take the American voters' choice away from them is SICKENING and we will not stand for it! We demand Debbie Wasserman Schultz be removed immediately!
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Protest no human rights in China! Protest China's judicial's corruption and the collusion of government & enterprise!
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Demand Democrats, Republicans of the Senate, House & Congress to Arrest & or Impeachment Obama, Biden & Hillary Clinton
body: Faithless Execution of, Article II, Section 3 of the Constitution requires the President to, Take Care that the Laws be faithfully executed. Article I, Usurpation of the Oval Office via criminal identity fraudArticle II, Malfeasance, misconduct and abuse of the Oval Office Article III, Aiding and Abetting known enemies of the United States, Treason, High Crimes & Misdemeanors. Illegal and unilateral changing of federal statutes,  Seven cases in which Obama has xamendedx Obamacare without legislative action, usurping powers reserved to Congress by Article 1 of the Constitution;  Five instances of Obamaxs unilateral amendments of immigration law, enacting policies Congress did not approve, making recess appointments when Senate was not in recess.Mrs Clintons e-mail Security Breach.
issues: c(311, 321, 29) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform", "Immigration")

title: The Biafran people are requesting the support of the government and people of USA for the creation of nation of Biafra
body: Biafra existed for thousands of years before being forced into Nigeria by the British government in 1914. Now, the people of Biafra want to leave Nigeria and to exist as their own sovereign nation. The Nigerian government in cahoots with Britain has killed over 5 million Biafrans in order to discourage them from pursuing UN-approved self-determination.The world continue to keep silent as genocide is continually being visited upon Biafrans. We are therefore, using this petition to call upon the US Government and the good people of America to come to the aid of Biafrans by supporting their quest for the sovereignty of the nation of Biafra. Help us to achieve independence for the nation of Biafra. Support the people of Biafra. Let the USA recognize Biafra as a sovereign nation.
issues: c(311, 24) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Foreign Policy")

title: federally recognize the Chinook Indian Nation as a tribe within the United States.
body: After decades of efforts, and broken federal promises, the Chinook Indian Nation was granted formal recognition in 2001. Eighteen months later, this decision was reversed by the administration of George W. Bush. Please visit www.chinooknation.org to help right this historical - and ongoing - wrong. Thanks very much!
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Exclude from the US advocates of Sharia, Caliphate, sex slavery, killing apostates/adulteresses, "honor killing," or FGM
body: Exclude or deport from the US and bar from naturalization any person who, regardless of religious belief, advocates or condones the following principles that are contrary to the American Constitution and values: Sharia law, a Caliphate state, violent jihad, child marriage, slavery or sex slavery, xhonorx killing, stoning adulteresses, killing apostates, female genital mutilation, or devaluation of inheritance or of legal testimony based on gender or religion; or who is or has been a member of any organization, or a participant in any of its activities, that advocates or condones any of the above. Such exclusion should not depend on any connection to terrorism or other violent actions, and should apply to visitors, immigrants, and refugees/asylees
issues: c(311, 29) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Immigration")

title: Make it illegal for employers to drug test for marijuana
body: People of the United States use marijuana every day. From eating disorders, insomnia, back pain, and many other illnesses. Some use it for recreational use. But people have to live in fear of not finding a job or losing thier job over it.   Trace amounts of Marijuana can stay in your system from 30 days to 45 days but marijuana does not affect you like  prescription drugs, cocaine, heroin, LSD and many more witch is out of your system in hours or a day.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Authorize Department of Homeland Security to renew Temporary Protected Status for Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone
body: The United People for African Congress and allied partners respectfully request that President Barack Obama directs the Department of Homeland Security to renew Temporary Protected Status for Liberian, Guinean and Sierra Leonean beneficiaries in the United States. While the 2014 Ebola crisis no longer poses a public health risk in the respective countries, their previously weak public healthcare infrastructures were decimated by the outbreak including the loss of hundreds of health care workers. TPS recipients from Liberia, Sierra Leone and Guinea are now legally employed and have become contributing members of their households in America and in their countries of origin. We are asking President Obama to appreciate the dire circumstances that still exist in these countries.
issues: c(311, 29) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Immigration")

title: ENDORSE BERNIE SANDERS AS THE DEMOCRATIC PARTY PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE 2016.
body: This is a petition for endorsement from Pres. Barrack Obama of Sen. Bernie Sanders Democratic Presidential candidate 2016.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Help stop the Smithsonian Channel from airing a new cable TV show focusing on Alaska plane crashes and their victims
body: When Adam first proposed,he gave me a ring box, I  said, "Are you asking me to marry you." He said "well, will you!" The last time I saw Adam, a month after our sons 1st bday, and the same day I found out I was pregnant again, I kissed him on the lips and the forehead although neither were recognizable. We not only lost Adam but our brother Derrik, who left behind his high school sweetheart and his 2 year old son. Our family/our lives were destroyed.On Feb 3, we learned the Smithsonian Channel will be airing a reality show about AK plane crashes and NTSB.They were quoted as saying:.do you want to give it a shot? And the rest is history." Well, the history for these children is my daughter will never go to a dad/daughter dance and so much more. Please help stop this show from airing. Please
issues: c(316, 311, 346) c("Economy & Jobs", "Civil Rights & Equality", "Transportation & Infrastructure")

title: Urge Donald Trump to not put a "Merkel Door" in his "Stop White Genocide Wall"
body: Mr. Trump knows that White self-hatred is SICK!!He knows that "diversity" means chasing down the last White person.He knows that Americans do not support the policy of "Asia for the Asians, Africa for the Africans, White countries for EVERYBODY."He knows that diversity is a code word for White Genocide.But, he's said his "Stop White Genocide Wall" will have a "big door" in it for legal immigrants to enter.President Obama, urge Donald Trump to not include in his Wall a door that will simply legalize White Genocide!Those who want an America with no child left White say they're anti-racist. What they are is anti-White.Anti-racist is a code word for anti-White.goo.gl/NygDxngoo.gl/f0hiwSgoo.gl/AQr3Fq
issues: c(326, 311, 29) c("Homeland Security & Defense", "Civil Rights & Equality", "Immigration")

title: Direct Department of Justice to remove cannabis: hemp/marijuana/THC/CBD/viable seed from the Controlled Substances Act
body: Enforcement of drug laws costs taxpayers over $40 billion annually.  Mass incarceration for non-violent drug offenses is racially biased, destroys families and results in high social costs.Hemp and marijuana are of the same plant genus with different potential. Legalizing one and not the other is costly, confusing, prevents study of the whole species, and ignores the synergy between them. DEA/DOJ policy prevents both the access to banks necessary to build a legitimate and safe cannabis industry and cultivation of a sustainable and useful crop that is grown in 30 developed nations.Pro-cannabis legislation exists in 38 states. Itxs time for federal policy to reflect public opinion. Legalize and let states tax and regulate!  JustSayNow.co
issues: c(296, 311) c("Energy & Environment", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Name March 1st "Nation Witch Trials Remembrance Day"; for those who died and lost their lives to religious persecution
body: On March 1st 1692 the Salem Witch trials began. 324 years later and Witches are still fight for respect to freely expression our religion void of Hollywood's incorrect interpretation. Witches are plagued by false pretense and the bigotry portrayed by screenwriters, as though the Craft is  rightfully articulated through poor Occult Genre. You won't find our holy days on any calendar. You won't see a National Monument paying respect to the men and women who lost their lives in the name of religious persecution and bigotry unless you make the trip to Salem Massachusetts. Our children do not learn about our history in school. I am an American Witch,  we are not defined by a screenplay or popular Genre intended to haunt movie goers. We are real people with Rights! Scary no more...
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: End The War on Drugs and Adopt a Policy of Harm Reduction
body: Just as President Obama has said time and time again "the science has proven climate change is real", science has proven that the War on Drugs has actually caused the negative effects of drug use to grow exponentially and violently. Other countries such as Switzerland and Portugal have implemented Harm Reduction policies in regard to drugs and have had astonishing results. We as a people need to stop criminalizing drug addicts and begin to find ways to address this disease that does not cause widespread violence and incarceration. Please see the link provided in this description for a full explanation. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wJUXLqNHCaI
issues: c(316, 24, 311) c("Economy & Jobs", "Foreign Policy", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Step in and make the FDA take Essure off the market to save lives.
body: The FDA has failed me and every other woman who has been hurt by Essure.  They will have blood on their hands for all the deaths of women and babies from this day forward all because they don't want to admit they were wrong. The FDA would rather back Bayer than do their jobs protecting the consumers. How can anyone trust the ONE agency that is specifically set up to make sure drugs and medical devices/equipment are safe for everyone to use, if they don't admit they were wrong in this case and make it right?? TAKE ESSURE OFF THE MARKET!!!! Save other women and their families ( because it doesn't just affect the women) from going through what hundreds of thousands of women around the world have gone through and continue to go through to this day. WE BEG you to PLEASE help us!
issues: c(25, 311) c("Health Care", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Demand the Oscars to issue a formal apology for using 3 Asian kids to be the butt of Chris Rock's malicious racial joke.
body: Introducing the accountants from PricewaterhouseCoopers, which tabulated the vote results during the 2016 Oscars, host Chris Rock instead brought onstage three young kids of Asian heritage. As the kids clutched briefcases, they visually illustrated the stereotype that Asians are diligent workers who excel at math. "If anybodyxs upset about that joke, just tweet about it on your phone that was also made by these kids,x Chris Rock added, a punch line as a reference to child labor in Asia. The Oscars demonstrated on TV that it is totally acceptable to continue to make malicious racial jokes on people with Asian heritage and YES even on Asian kids. That can translate into it is okay to continue to bully Asian kids because the Oscars approved this behavior.  We the people say it is NOT OKAY.
issues: c(301, 18, 311) c("Innovation: Arts & Technology", "Education", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Investigate the violations of Massachusetts voting laws conducted by Bill Clinton on March 1, 2016.
body: We the undersigned ask the President of the United States to exercise his authority to investigate the egregious violations of Massachusetts election law that Bill Clinton carried out during the recent Democratic primary in Massachusetts. These include but are not limited to:Entering a polling place for no legal purpose as defined by the statutes.Electioneering within the 150 foot restricted zone outside a polling place.Inhibiting voters ability to enter their polling place due to his presence requiring Secret Service personnel to shut off access.We encourage you to use the power vested in your office to direct that an investigation take place forthwith to determine whether these violations are prosecutable offenses.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Investigate William "Bill" Jefferson Clinton for violation of Massachusetts legislature Title VIII/ Chapter 54/ Sec 69
body: Tuesday, March 1, 2016, William "Bill" Jefferson Clinton was seen and filmed inside an estimated 4 different polling centers in Massachusetts. Shaking hands and promoting his wife, Hillary Rodham Clinton, to voters before casting their choice for the Democratic Primary Nomination.  According to http://www.malegislature.gov/laws/generalLaws/part1/titlevIII/chapter54/section69 it is illegal to be inside a polling center unless you are voting or you are an established employee of the polling center. In which he was neither! With this illegal action, the very fabric of voting becomes tattered! This is not about candidate against candidate, this is between right and wrong. Do not allow people to thumb their noses at regulations without repercussions!
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: ENCOURAGE CONGRESS TO ALLOW PUERTO RICANS THE RIGHT TO VOTE FOR U.S. PRESIDENTIAL ELECTIONS
body: Currently, Puerto Ricans living in the island of Puerto Rico can only exercise their voting rights during the Presidential Primaries, while, Puerto Ricans residing in the United States can exercise their voting rights in the Presidential Primaries and U.S. Presidential Elections.In response to the United States voting rights, our fifteenth amendment rights must be extended equally to all U.S. Citizens.This would allow Puerto Ricans in the island the right to vote in the U.S. Presidential Elections.We Puerto Ricans and Citizens of the United States of America, petition for the administration to encourage Congress to take the necessary actions to allow Puerto Ricoxs residents the same voting rights as those U.S. Citizens living in the United States of America.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Support the prevention of nuclear weapons by the North Corea
body: Considering the usage and existence of nuclear weapons as a threat for the whole humanity, we strongly encourage Obama Administration to take serious actions to prevent preparation of nuclear weapons in the North Korea.  Even the UN Security Council has adopted five major resolutions that impose and strengthen sanctions on North Korea for continuing to develop its nuclear weapons program. Somehow, more actions must be taken so that the North Korea refrains from ballistic missile tests.       To this date, UN Security Council resolutions have failed in preventing North Korea from resuming its nuclear weapons and other dangerous missile programs. In spite the fact that, the sanctions have slowed development in these areas, human lives are still in threatening situation.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Keep the Ambassador of USA in Dominican Republic for promoting LGBT agenda consistent with open minded peoplexs values.
body: We request the Obama administration and in future hopefully Berniexs administration to maintain the U.S. ambassador in Dominican Republic, James W. Brewster for promoting a LGBT agenda consistent with open minded peoplexs values of the Dominican Republic.Since his arrival in November 2013, he has supported the inauguration of a LGBT Chamber of Commerce.Amb. Brewster involves his spouse in official activities as he should, like a visit to a school where he was invited to speak about the United Nations Model, which caused ignorant people to loose their hats! Though some believe DR to be a tolerant country, religious agendas are disrespectful to the culture and traditions of educated Dominican families.We choose love, not hate.We choose to accept, not discriminate.
issues: c(311, 18) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Education")

title: Pass Lynn's Law to make public HP restroom stalls friendlier for those with ostomies, feeding tubes, IV's, and catheters
body: HP accessible stalls are not friendly to people who have ostomies, feeding tubes, IV lines, urinary catheters, or other similar medical devices. If people have an ostomy leak and need to change their bags, there is no way to do it discreetly. Stalls should include a sink to allow for cleanup. There should be a shelf at seated level to set out medical supplies for tubes, IV's, and ostomies. A hook should be provided next to the toilet to hang feeding bags. The floor is unsterile and the hooks on doors are too far. Sterility is crucial with these devices. A red sharps container is important for safe disposal of needles and syringes. HP stalls should be restricted to those whose physicians deem it necessary, similar to HP accessible parking spots. Patients can't wait without consequences.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Open a Justice dept. investigation into Kansas DCF for the unlawful seizing and trafficking of children.
body: April 2015 the Schwab Family had their children kidnapped by the State of Kansas while Raymond and Amelia Schwab were packing to move to Denver. Mr. Schwab, an honorably discharged, disabled Navy Veteran who uses medical Cannabis for PTSD and chronic pain, had his job at the Dept. of Veteran Affairs transferred to Denver where both he and his wife could have access to care and receive that care legally. Kansas is using their children as political pawns and continues to assert unless they cease Cannabis Therapy they will lose their children forever.Violating every Kansas Statue concerning the removal of Children, and refusing to recognize any of the Schwabxs legal and Constitutional protections the Schwab Children have been repeatedly moved into abusive situations.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Classify MoveOn.org as a terrorist group due to their violations of the 1st Amendment.
body: On 3/11/2016 MoveOn.org organized a violent protest at a presidential election rally in Chicago Illinois. Protesters attempted to stir up violence and refused to leave a private event even after police responded. This rally prevented presidential candidate Donald J. Trump from speaking due to a threat of violence. We the people believe that these actions not only resulted in a 1st amendment violation, but were also encouraged by hate. Because of their 1st amendment violations and ability to organize large violent groups, we ask that you classify MoveOn.org as a terrorist group.
issues: c(321, 336, 311) c("Criminal Justice Reform", "Government & Regulatory Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Demand National Public Radio, NPR, cover each Democratic equally and fairly.
body: We believe there has been a clear bias regarding NPR or National Public Radio. All we ask is that each candidate is represented equally, fairly, and without bias. That each receives equal air time so the public gets to know each candidates' platform. There has been a clear showing of favoritism among candidatea which should not be the case in a publicly funded entity.
issues: c(311, 316, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: remove Secret Service detail from Donald Trump
body: Trump should not have been granted Secret Service protection this early in his campaign.  He is inciting hatred and violence and our tax dollars should not be paying for his protection.
issues: c(306, 311, 326) c("Budget & Taxes", "Civil Rights & Equality", "Homeland Security & Defense")

title: Arrest and prosecute Donald J. Trump for incitement to violence. Legal precedent: Brandenburg v. Ohio.
body: Donald J. Trump has been inciting violent acts amongst his supporters. He should be arrested and prosecuted for this. Legal precedent: Brandenburg v. Ohio. To wit, the Court held that government cannot punish inflammatory speech.UNLESS that speech is directed to inciting, and is likely to incite, imminent lawless action.Clearly, he is doing exactly that.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: Revoke Kansas' statehood under Article 4, Section 4 for failure to guarantee a republican form of government.
body: Sam Brownback was re-elected Governor of Kansas in a vote being challenged by a professor of statistics in federal court.He pushed tax cuts in favor of saddling the poor with the nation's highest sales tax on food.He robbed highway and pension funds, saddling them with bonds that will take a generation to repay. Now, he wants to take funds from the tobacco settlement and local library taxes.Legislation is being pushed making judges subject to impeachment if they rule against the legislature.State law leaves no legal remedy via recall.We urge the President to certify that Kansas can no longer guarantee a republican form of government under Article 4, Section 4; revoke Kansas' statehood; and appoint a Territorial Governor until such time as it proves worthy of re-admission to the Union.
issues: c(306, 336, 311) c("Budget & Taxes", "Government & Regulatory Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Change the majority law in Nebraska
body: The current legal majority age in Nebraska is 19. While the majority age in most states is 18. In the state of Nebraska, an 18 year old can purchase tobacco, vote, enlist in the military, and apply for a credit card. However, one cannot make the adult decision of signing a lease to move out without a parent's consent. This becomes an inconvenience for teens wanting to take on the responsibility of moving out of their parent/guardian's home, in order to begin a new chapter of their lives or break free from a troubled home life. Not to mention, it also becomes an issue for out of state students who move to the state of Nebraska for college. Changing the majority age in Nebraska would allow any 18 year old to have the same privileges as those in most other state, and prevent inconveniences.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Deport Donald J. Trump
body: Our nation's Founding Fathers coined the expression that appears on the Great Seal of the United States, "E Pluribus Unum" which means "from many, one." Simply put, our nation's founders aspired to make the United States of America a place where people of different backgrounds, faiths, ethnicity, etc., could come together and be one as Americans.  That is the promise of America that makes our nation exceptional. Donald Trump represents the antithesis of this vision. Trump's goal is not to unite but to divide Americans - to divide us by religion, race and ethnicity.  To pit American against American. Consequently, to preserve the eternal promise of our nation, we call upon the Obama administration to deport Trump to a nation that will grant him residency. (Assuming there is one.)
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Prosecute Moveon.org for violating Trump supporter's freedom of speech and assembly and inciting violence at rallies.
body: We the people are calling for the prosecution of the agents of Moveon.org for violating the civil liberties of Presidential candidate Donald J. Trump and his followers. The incident on March 11th, 2016 in Chicago, IL violates not only Mr. Trump's freedom of speech, but also his supporter's freedom of assembly, all protected under the 1st amendment of the United States Constitution. Not only were the civil liberties of Trump and his supporter's violated, but also violence was incited by Moveon.org members in which several supporters were physically assaulted within a private venue. As the election process is our main pillar of Democracy, this type of interference shall not be tolerated and must be prosecuted to ensure a free and safe society.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Start a DOJ investigation for the instances of Bill Clinton electioneering, in accordance with State and Federal Laws.
body: The purpose of this petition is for President to start a Department of Justice investigation of the alleged electioneering by former President Bill Clinton, in accordance of both State and Federal laws in Massachusetts and Illinois during the democratic primary elections. We are asking for a full investigation and prosecution of any and all electioneering violations under Federal and State electioneering laws including, but not limited to; Any electioneering laws under the e-CFR, 题澶100.12题迨Identification (52 U.S.C. 30101(13)), Massachusetts ( 950 CMR 53.03(18); 54.04.22)), and Illinois (10 Ill. Comp. Stat. 题澶 5/17x29(a)), and all other Federal, State, and local electioneering laws that may apply from the dates of 2 March 2016 to 15 March 2016.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: DEMAND THAT THE FLORIDA VOTERS BE ALLOWED TO VOTE AGAIN, DUE TO POLLING LOCATION RUNNING OUT OF BALLOTS & CLOSING EARLY.
body: On March 15, 2016, Florida voters were denied their rights to vote, due to polling locations running out of Democratic ballots and polling locations closing early. We The People demand that the Obama administration investigate these allegations and if these allegations are indeed fact, then we demand that Florida voters should have an alternative voting date for the 2016 Democratic primaries.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: We want Alex Fong and Stephy Tang to make up and marry.
body: Hong Kong singers Alex Fong and Stephy Tang had been in a relationship for 10 years but they suddenly announced that they had broken up. We urge the White House to mediate the event and we want them to make up. This can enhance Hong KongxUnited States relations if this petition is successful.
issues: c(311, 24) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Foreign Policy")

title: Initiate a Federal Investigation into the death of John Lang, a suspected murder by Fresno Police Department.
body: This petition calls for a federal investigation into the Fresno Police Department of Fresno, California, regarding the death of John Lang, a known activist within the Fresno community.We the people believe that a Federal investigation into the conduct of the Fresno Police Department, leading up to the death of John Lang, warrants federal review.We the people assert that an investigation into these agencies is necessary in order to demonstrate the Obama Administration's commitment to restoring transparency within the justice system.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: Do a revote of the Arizona primary due to voter suppression.
body: We the people ask for a revote of the Arizona primary due to voter suppression. Many registered voters who registered Democrat/Republican before the cut off or who have been registered Democrat/Republican for many years are being turned down due to the mislabeling of their registered party for the primary. We ask that this immediately be corrected and fixed and allow the residents of Arizona to participate in a revote for honest Arizona primary voting results.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: INVESTIGATE THE VOTER FRAUD AND VOTER SUPPRESSION IN ARIZONA 3/22/2016 DEMOCRATIC PARTY.
body: Petition to have the Obama Administration investigate the voter fraud and voter suppression on 3/22/2016 in ARIZONA. Numerous voters who switched from Independent to Democrat could not vote and were turned away or given provisional ballots which in turn were never counted. We the people of the United States of America find this act alarming and would like a complete investigation to uncover the violations that occurred during the Arizona voting on 3/22/2016 and prosecute those responsible to the fullest extent of the law.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Reduce the time a voter must wait to vote in a federal election to under one hour.
body: It is an undue burden to expect voters to wait for multiple hours in order to vote. It permits only those who have many hours to spare to participate in democracy.In president Obama's 2012 acceptance speech, speaking about the hours many people had to wait, he stated "We have to fix that." And yet, four years later it seems that nothing has been done.We petition president Obama to mandate that every voter be guaranteed a wait time of less than one hour to cast his/her ballot for every federal election. There should be measures in place so that the wait time can be reduced in case of excessive turnout. Should a voter be forced to wait longer than an hour, that voter should be compensated for his/her time.
issues: c(336, 311) c("Government & Regulatory Reform", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: Have the FBI investigate voter registration changes that have happened in multiple states, NY, PA, CA, AZ, and prosecute
body: Somehow voter registrations information has been changed all across the country. People within States like AZ, NY, and PA have been checking their voter status and noticing that they've been changed from Democrats to Independents. These changes happened WITHOUT consent of the voters and without their knowledge. These changes have caused issues with Democrats trying to vote thus far in AZ and likey to cause the same impact on the remaining states. We petition the president to have the FBI investigate these changes in these states and every remaining state that has not had their primary. We request prosecution of  those responsible for the changes as well. We the voters are tired of our Democracy being hijacked and would like our Constitution given right to vote unimpeded.
issues: c(311, 321, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Investigate the discrepancies in voter party affiliation during the 2016 Presidential Primaries.
body: After the Arizona primary vote where confusion, unauthorized discrepancies in voter registrations, long lines, unethical news reporting and incompetence resulted in the feeling of voter suppression amongst many, individuals flocked to check their own voter status.Thousands of voters found that their party affiliation had changed without authorization from Democrat to a variety of other options including Republican, Independent, Libertarian, and non-affiliated. This incident has been reported in states so far, NY, CA, PA, NJ, MD and OR. This is concerning, particularly in the instances of closed or semi closed primary states that have yet to vote. We petition the White House to investigate this breach of security for voters to ensure that ALL are able to vote without suppression.
issues: c(311, 336, 301) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform", "Innovation: Arts & Technology")

title: HELP THE CONGOLESE PEOPLE REGAIN THEIR HUMANITY AND DIGNITY
body: The Republic of Congo-Brazzaville recently held a presidential xelectionx under government-enforced media blackout (supposedly for security reasons). Notwithstanding the excessive vote-rigging conditions that favored the incumbent candidate, Congolese people came out in throng to vote and rejected the autocratic regime of Denis Sassou Nguesso. Appallingly, the electoral commission in lockstep with the incumbent stole the peoplexs votes and declared Denis Sassou Nguesso as the winner. The post electoral situation is very tense and can go from bad to worse at any moment. Congo-Brazzaville experienced civil wars in the 1990s and early 2000s. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. once said, xInjustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.x Please sign the petition and help the people of the Congo.
issues: c(311, 24) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Foreign Policy")

title: Monitor all remaining primaries to prevent irregularities and to ensure full participation of qualified voters,
body: Due to problems in primaries held thus far we ask that the Federal government monitor the remaining primaries more closely to ensure that all qualified voters who wish to vote are able to do so.  It is our belief that there are those who would manipulate access to the ballot to influence the outcome of elections.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Restore the Writ of Habeas Corpus to help the innocent get exonerated for crimes they were falsely accused of committing
body: If you were falsely accused and wrongfully convicted, you would want every possible legal safety net to help you. Prior to 1996, the Writ of Habeas Corpus was that safety net. But that safety net was shredded by the 1996 Anti-Terrorism and Effective Death Penalty Act. Now, even if a state court misapplies the Constitution, you still can't have your conviction overturned by a federal court. We Americans deserve to be protected from having our lives and good names ruined by false convictions. Prison is a terrible place, and it's all the worse if you don't belong there. People worry about the government taking away people's rights, but this is the exact opposite: under the aforementioned 1996 law, the government CAN'T give you your Constitutional rights. It is time to correct this injustice.
issues: c(311, 321) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Criminal Justice Reform")

title: The abolishment of any and all taxes nationwide on sales of Tampons and other related feminine hygiene necessities.
body: We the people petiton the government to abolish the charging of any taxes on tampons and all feminine hygiene products especially those associated with a woman's menstrual cycle and to change the classification of these products to 'necessity' to qualify them for exemption under the current tax code.
issues: c(306, 25, 311) c("Budget & Taxes", "Health Care", "Civil Rights & Equality")

title: ACT NOW TO SAVE PUERTO RICO'S DEMOCRACY FROM WALL STREET.
body: Puerto Rico's debt is more than $72 billion, nearly 100% of its economic output. Double digit unemployment, hundreds of schools closing and a healthcare crisis have triggered the exodus of 1K+ Puerto Ricans per week.Congress has declined to extend debt-restructuring powers to Puerto Rico, instead yielding to vulture funds and powerful Wall Street interests. According to the draft of the PROMESA Act, an Oversight Control Board will have the power to act on behalf of the Governor and gov. agencies. These decisions are not subject to judicial review.Puerto Rico rejects a federal control board and attempts against our democracy. The Executive Branch should use the tools at its disposal to help Puerto Rico, as it has done in the past when big banks came calling for help.Obama, ACT NOW!
issues: c(311, 316) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Economy & Jobs")

title: Put Bernie Sanders on the Washington D.C. Ballot
body: We petition that Bernie Sanders is to be put on the Washington D.C. ballot. By not having him on the ballot is taking away the right of the voters to have their voices heard and be able to choose their favored candidate. It is unfair and voter suppression to keep voters from being able to vote for who they want. This needs to be fixed before D.C. voters cast their votes.
issues: 311 Civil Rights & Equality

title: Disallow the use of super-delegate voting at the 2016 Democratic National Convention
body: Super-delegate voting privilege used in the Democratic Party's nominating process for the office of President of the United States of America is unjust and undermines the integrity of the American democracy. The use of super-delegates in the primary voting process creates an oligarchy in which the will and voice of the American people is suppressed. The opinion and influence of a few party leaders should not override the collective majority decision of the American voters.Therefore, we the people, call on President Obama, the figure-head of the Democratic Party, to publicly address the leaders of the Democratic Party to change party rules to disallow the use of super-delegate voting at the 2016 Democratic Party National Convention and all future conventions.
issues: c(311, 336) c("Civil Rights & Equality", "Government & Regulatory Reform")

title: Build Donald Trump's Stop White Genocide Wall and inscribe on it, "'Diversity' means chasing down the last White person"
body: Inscribe these truths also:White self-hatred is SICK!!"Diversex means FORMERLY whiteAsia for the Asians, Africa for the Africans, White countries for EVERYBODY!EVERY White country and ONLY White countries are being flooded with third world non-Whites, and Whites are forced by law to integrate with them so as to "assimilate," i.e. intermarry and be blended out of existence.When such forced immigration and assimilation is done in Tibet it's called genocide, but in White countries it's called "diversity."Diversity is a code word for White Genocide.Those who want a future with no child left White say they're anti-racist. What they are is anti-White.Anti-reacist is a code word for anti-White.goo.gl/rG0KAagoo.gl/AQr3Fqgoo.gl/f0hiwSgoo.gl/9B3M2Jgoo.gl/oYPRkkgoo.gl/jn7L1o
